summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Journey Into the Structure of Your Beliefs & How You Create Reality
Review Date: 2012/08/14
Store: Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
Product Description: ['This exclusive interview was filmed live in San Francisco in 2009, and is packed with a variety of practical information on how to identify and change beliefs. Here is your opportunity to learn all about the deeper structure of core limiting beliefs, how they are formed and how they influence your ability to create reality. Robert Dilts and Tim Hallbom are internationally recognized experts in the field of Neurolinguistic Programming, as well as co-authors of the best selling book, Beliefs: Pathways to Health and Well-Being. Dilts and Hallbom have developed many popular techniques for identifying and changing limiting beliefs throughout their expansive careers, and are world renowned for their work with belief systems. Join Kris Hallbom, as she interviews these two pioneers of belief change about their fascinating discoveries and vast experiences with NLP and Belief Applications. By watching this DVD, you will: Learn all about the deeper structure of core limiting beliefs and how they are formed, and why they can be so difficult to identify and change. Discover what a Premature Cognitive Commitment is, and how these unconscious commitments influence your perceptual filters and the world around you. Learn what a belief is, and the four ways for identifying and recognizing core limiting beliefs. Find out new information about how we create reality, and how our perceptions of reality are often influenced by our limiting beliefs. Discover how to identify and change limiting beliefs through Reimprinting, Eye Accessing Cues, and Timeline Orientation Experience Tim and Robert sharing some incredible stories about the power of your beliefs and how they can influence every area of your life including: health, relationships, business and money.']
Average Rating: 1.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Actors': 'Robert Dilts, Tim Hallbom'}
Review Text: This DVD has no content- you can google nlp or go to utube and get 100 times more infomation for free. wasnt worth 5 bucks much less what they are asking.
Review Title: Dont waste your money
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Title: A Reiki Prosperity Attunement plus Subliminal Persuasion Programs to Increase Your Prosperity
Review Date: 2014/09/16
Store: Steve Murray  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Special Interests
Product Description: ["Watch Steve's trailers on this page for his new Reiki DVD and see his psychic abilities. Tens of thousands of people throughout the world have successfully received Reiki Attunements from Steve Murray s DVDS and are now healing themselves and others ----The Reiki Prosperity Attunement, when taken will reveal what you need to know to increase Prosperity in your life. It does this by unlocking your prosperity knowledge hidden in your subconscious and revealing it to your conscious mind. Once this is done, you can act upon your own unique prosperity knowledge. Any person can take the Reiki Prosperity Attunement and start their Prosperity Course of Action. The DVD also has three bonus programs. Each program creates a process called Subliminal Persuasion. One program releases the fear that keeps away prosperity and the other two motivate and keep you focused on prosperity---DVD includes: A Reiki Prosperity Attunement, How the Attunement works, Directions for taking the Attunement, Prosperity Subliminal Persuasion Program One, Prosperity Subliminal Persuasion Program Two, Prosperity Subliminal Persuasion Program Three. You will also learn: What is a Prosperity Course of Action, What is a Prosperity Mental Blockage, What is a Prosperity Plan---An Attunement is a sacred process, initiation and/or meditation with a specific purpose and intent performed by a Spiritual Master, in this case, Steve Murray. The Attunement will last for life and can be taken many times for reinforcement and enhancement --- This Reiki DVD is part of Steve’s Reiki Certification program. Contact Steve through his web site to get details on how to get you Reiki Master Certification. No belief system or religion is required to experience the Attunement"]

Review Text: all of the dvd's skip - all of the dvd's have a nice background and are filmed in pretty areas - but that is as far as the compliments go - he his horrible at directing you into positions if you are a beginner you could really hurt yourself  - its not much of a work out either nor is the meditation any good - I purchased the 108 day ultimate yogi which I love! it is the best but all of those workouts are like an hour long so I purchased this set for days when I was running behind on time and wanted a shorter workout - but this was a waste of money - I end up turning it off because it gets on my nerves so bad - the ultimate yogi has me feeling great and ready to start my day - this bliss ology has me wishing I had my 50 dollars and 30 minutes back - don't waste your money
Review Title: dont waste your money - get ultimate yogi instead
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Carole Maggio Ultimate Facercise
Review Date: 2015/03/20
Store: Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Movies
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, CD+DVD', 'Studio': 'Carole Maggio', 'Number of discs': '3'}
Review Text: This also comes in a book, which I purchased and ended up sending back because it was to hard to figure out what she is trying to get you to do just from looking at the pictures. You definitely need the DVD.  What this does  is it tones up the muscles in the face and neck. Just like your abs or arms have muscles that can get saggy, so does your face, so this helps tone up the facial muscles, it can help get rid of the saggy chin and help lift the eyes and the corners of the mouth. This comes with 2 DVD's as well as an audio cd.  the 1st DVD that you start with goes into great detail about each exercise to make sure that you are doing them properly after you do that several times and you learn how to do the exercises the right way then you move onto the 2nd DVD which is the same thing but much shorter, it doesn't have all of the instruction, you just quickly move through the exercises and only takes about 15 minutes.  The audio cd is just the audio version of the 2nd dvd so that you can listen to it on the go and do your exercises in the car. So this is a great way to multitask and keep your face in shape. lol
Review Title: this really works!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: How To Do The Dave Elman Hypnotic Induction. By Malik I. Awan C.Ht. Hypnosis Training DVD
Review Date: 2017/02/15
Store: Malik I. Awan  (Actor, Director, Narrator, Host, Commentary)    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Movies
Product Description: ['The Dave Elman Hypnotic Induction is one of the most powerful Hypnotic Inductions available to the Hypnotists! It is widely used by the Hypnotherapists around the world because of its power, variability, adaptability and quickness. It can take even your first time clients from their normal state of awareness to the deep state of Hypnosis, i.e., Somnambulism, in four minutes or less! It is equally effective for one-on-one sessions as well as group-sessions. In this video Malik gives you the history of this Hypnotic Induction. He explains the dynamics of Hypnosis. Shows you live video clips of the problems that may arise while using any Hypnotic Induction. Demonstrates this Induction from start to finish by showing you the video clips. Tells you what to look out for while hypnotizing your clients. Explains why and how to know the difference between Somnambulism and Pseudo-Somnambulism, and how to deal with it. You will learn how to use this powerful Induction with groups of any size! Malik explains the whole Induction Step-By-Step for your one-on-one sessions as well as groups. Written material includes the Induction from start to finish, Suggestibility Test, and Deepening Techniques. Also available in VHS. Kindly check in VHS-Hypnosis category.']

This also comes in a book, which I purchased and ended up sending back because it was to hard to figure out what she is trying to get you to do just from looking at the pictures. You definitely need the DVD.  What this does  is it tones up the muscles in the face and neck. Just like your abs or arms have muscles that can get saggy, so does your face, so this helps tone up the facial muscles, it can help get rid of the saggy chin and help lift the eyes and the corners of the mouth. This comes with 2 DVD's as well as an audio cd.  the 1st DVD that you start with goes into great detail about each exercise to make sure that you are doing them properly after you do that several times and you learn how to do the exercises the right way then you move onto the 2nd DVD which is the same thing but much shorter, it doesn't have all of the instruction, you just quickly move through the exercises and only takes about 15 minutes. How To Do The Dave Elman Hypnotic Induction. By Malik I. Awan C.Ht. Hypnosis Training DVD
Malik I. Awan  (Actor, Director, Narrator, Host, Commentary)    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Movies
['The Dave Elman Hypnotic Induction is one of the most powerful Hypnotic Inductions available to the Hypnotists! It is widely used by the Hypnotherapists around the world because of its power, variability, adaptability and quickness. It can take even your first time clients from their normal state of awareness to the deep state of Hypnosis, i.e., Somnambulism, in four minutes or less! It is equally effective for one-on-one sessions as well as group-sessions. In this video Malik gives you the history of this Hypnotic Induction. He explains the dynamics of Hypnosis. Shows you live video clips of the problems that may arise while using any Hypnotic Induction. Demonstrates this Induction from start to finish by showing you the video clips. Tells you what to look out for while hypnotizing your clients. Explains why and how to know the difference between Somnambulism and Pseudo-Somnambulism, and how to deal with it. You will learn how to use this powerful Induction with groups of any size! Malik explains the whole Induction Step-By-Step for your one-on-one sessions as well as groups. Written material includes the Induction from start to finish, Suggestibility Test, and Deepening Techniques. Also available in VHS. Kindly check in VHS-Hypnosis category.']

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, summarize this person's genuine preferences and 
        patterns in under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. 
        Do not repeat specific product names or details.

Here's the purchase data:

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Journey Into the Structure of Your Beliefs & How You Create Reality
Review Date: 2012/08/14
Store: Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
Product Description: ['This exclusive interview was filmed live in San Francisco in 2009, and is packed with a variety of practical information on how to identify and change beliefs. Here is your opportunity to learn all about the deeper structure of core limiting beliefs, how they are formed and how they influence your ability to create reality. Robert Dilts and Tim Hallbom are internationally recognized experts in the field of Neurolinguistic Programming, as well as co-authors of the best selling book, Beliefs: Pathways to Health and Well-Being. Dilts and Hallbom have developed many popular techniques for identifying and changing limiting beliefs throughout their expansive careers, and are world renowned for their work with belief systems. Join Kris Hallbom, as she interviews these two pioneers of belief change about their fascinating discoveries and vast experiences with NLP and Belief Applications. By watching this DVD, you will: Learn all about the deeper structure of core limiting beliefs and how they are formed, and why they can be so difficult to identify and change. Discover what a Premature Cognitive Commitment is, and how these unconscious commitments influence your perceptual filters and the world around you. Learn what a belief is, and the four ways for identifying and recognizing core limiting beliefs. Find out new information about how we create reality, and how our perceptions of reality are often influenced by our limiting beliefs. Discover how to identify and change limiting beliefs through Reimprinting, Eye Accessing Cues, and Timeline Orientation Experience Tim and Robert sharing some incredible stories about the power of your beliefs and how they can influence every area of your life including: health, relationships, business and money.']
Average Rating: 1.0

Review Text: This also comes in a book, which I purchased and ended up sending back because it was to hard to figure out what she is trying to get you to do just from looking at the pictures. You definitely need the DVD.  What this does  is it tones up the muscles in the face and neck. Just like your abs or arms have muscles that can get saggy, so does your face, so this helps tone up the facial muscles, it can help get rid of the saggy chin and help lift the eyes and the corners of the mouth. This comes with 2 DVD's as well as an audio cd.  the 1st DVD that you start with goes into great detail about each exercise to make sure that you are doing them properly after you do that several times and you learn how to do the exercises the right way then you move onto the 2nd DVD which is the same thing but much shorter, it doesn't have all of the instruction, you just quickly move through the exercises and only takes about 15 minutes.  The audio cd is just the audio version of the 2nd dvd so that you can listen to it on the go and do your exercises in the car. So this is a great way to multitask and keep your face in shape. lol
Review Title: this really works!
Rating: 5.0

raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Content Type:** Primarily purchases DVDs related to self-help, personal development, fitness, and wellness.
- **Interests:** Strong inclination towards belief systems, personal transformation, and holistic practices (e.g., Reiki, NLP).
- **Exercise Focus:** Engaged in fitness programs targeting physical fitness, body toning, and yoga, indicating a commitment to health and wellness.
- **Critical Reviews:** Multiple instances of dissatisfaction highlight a tendency to evaluate value rigorously, often expressing disappointment when perceived quality does not meet expectations.
- **Positive Feedback:** Genuine satisfaction with certain effective programs, especially those connecting physical exercise to wellness or facial toning.
- **Avoidance of Waste:** Frequent warnings against wasting money reflect a pragmatic approach to purchases, seeking value for investment.
- **Information Gathering:** Preference for comprehensive, well-organized instructional content over vague or poorly executed material.
- **Skeptical of Claims:** Skepticism towards products that promise dramatic results without substantial evidence or support, often opting for alternative sources (e.g., free online content).

Overall, this shopping behavior conveys a cautious, discerning consumer focused on personal growth and wellbeing while demanding high-quality, effective content.
